title: Beautifully Tainted
description: Librarian Note: this is an alternate cover edition for ASIN: B00IGAFWY0.When secrets and lies are exposed, danger will ensue.My life was perfect. Perfectly boring. Which is how I preferred it to be. Trust didn't come easy and for good reason.When I ran into the new detective in town, I knew the second our eyes locked, he'd be my downfall. He had too many questions. Pressed too hard for me to let him in. And they were both the dangerous combination neither of us could afford.
author: A.M. Guilliams
